Gangon walked up in the distance, he had seen some of his Pred buddies come
this way and he followed. Upon his arival, Lightmare came out of hiding.
Gangon knew he wasn't of use anymore to BrightBlade now that she was a
bombad general, but he figured he might as well help. Gangon took out 2
machine guns and fired them at Oblitercon's side. Lightmare walked around
Gangon and taapped him on the shoulder. Gangon turned his head and Lightmare
punched him, knocking him out. Lightmare walked into his place and fired her
gattling gun at Oblitercon...
----- Original Message -----
From: <crow_lord@...>

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Sniper
>
> Sniper aims his two Rifles at Oblitrons back. He yells in his
> comlink.
> "Oblitron, this is a Maximal. Let my friends go and I might let you
> go. Might I remind you the I'm quicker and Have better aim then you!
> So leave or get shot by the expert."
